ygData.subject: Re: Kithicor Spookiness
ygData.msgSnippet: The absolutely scariest zone I have ever played in was a low levelled Erudite in Tox forest the combined darkness and the fact that there were lots of
ygData.messageBody:
The absolutely scariest zone I have ever played in was a low levelled
Erudite in Tox forest

the combined darkness and the fact that there were lots of "skeleton's"
running around scared me quite a bit.
----- Original Message -----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 1:46 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kithicor Spookiness


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Tim and Mary Steed wrote:
>
> I didn't think about it until later, but from the time I
> entered Kithicor to the time I left, I did not SEE one
> single critter. No beetle. No bat. No nothing. He told me
> that he thought the zone was "haunted" in more ways than
> one. At the time, I laughed, thinking that he was taking
> the game a little too seriously.
>
> Now, after hearing other stories from fellow bards, I
> realize he could very well be right.
